body: (BanG Dreamer's Party! 14th STAGE) [素鼠フォーヴィスム (神護カジキ)] リトライ 番のやり直し (BanG Dream!)

This is frustrating! The sequel is already here but the first part doesn't have an English translation yet. I'm dying to read that and this in English now. I already save them in my favorites, and I've been reading the first part over and over again even if it's not in English. Please someone translate the two!!!!
